_header: O ye people of Jerusalem behold and see
_description: A liturgical text of the prophecies of the Advent — in rhyme royal

CamMagPep1236.First Lines:
O ye pepill of ierusalem beholde & semake your respecte in to
                    the orient…
CamMagPep1236.Last Lines:
…O ye pepyll of ierusalem whyle ye may attaynaske mercy of
                    this lorde for your offenslyft vp your heddis to your
                    souerayne…
CamMagPep1236.Note:
Two full stanzas and three lines of third, to which are added further
                    lines by a later hand, as if to complete an 8-line stanza, ending, ‘does
                    not the Eternal law command that thou / Shalt euen as well forbeare to make as
                    bow[?]’ (f. 127v); rubric headings, ‘Ieremias’,
                    ‘Ysayas’, ‘David’ to right of each stanza.
